title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\DeidentifyConfig
name: DeidentifyConfig
description:
The configuration that controls how the data will change.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.DeidentifyConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.info_type_transformations
params.description: Treat the dataset as free-form text and apply the same free text transformation everywhere.

params.name: data.record_transformations
params.description: Treat the dataset as structured. Transformations can be applied to specific locations within structured datasets, such as transforming a column within a table.

params.name: data.transformation_error_handling
params.description: Mode for handling transformation errors. If left unspecified, the default mode is TransformationErrorHandling.ThrowError.
